docs.lead_paragraph: AT fourscore years (which he attains today) Elihu Root may be consulting counsel for all the world. In Roosevelt's spacious days they called his "Fireman Root," and he was the emergency man of that most energetic President's Administratration.

headline.main: ELIHU ROOT AT 80, COUNSEL TO THE WORLD; After 25 Years of Public Service He Has Not Yet Reached Old Age as Defined by Cato ELIHU ROOT AT 80

docs.abstract: Sp art, Elihu Root at 80, Counsel to the World; por
docs.snippet: AT fourscore years (which he attains today) Elihu Root may be consulting counsel for all the world. In Roosevelt's spacious days they called his "Fireman Root," and he was the emergency man of that most energetic President's Administratration.
